transcend.4:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+3% Resilience
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+3% Resilience
+25 Action Points at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: Hiya!
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> chance to increase all allies' <color=#28d9ed>Effectiveness</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000030_1_1]</color> chance to increase all allies' <color=#28d9ed>Effectiveness</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000030_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Let the Forging Begin!
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Grants a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. The barrier strength is proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color>.
description: Grants a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000030_2_1] turn(s)</color>. The barrier strength is proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Walk-off Grand Slam!
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Stunned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Increases the chance to inflict Stunned by 15%

description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000030_3_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Stunned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000030_3_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to increase Effectiveness of the caster for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to increase Effectiveness of the caster for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000030_chain_1_1]</color> chance to increase Effectiveness of the caster for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000030_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000030_backup_1_1]</color> chance to increase Effectiveness of the caster for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000030_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
